authors.name: Matthew Alhonte
authors.bio: Super villain in somebody's action hero movie. Experienced a radioactive freak accident at a young age, which rendered him part-snake and strangely adept at Python.

https://xeno.graphics/

Awesome series, out with a new entry!

https://tomaugspurger.github.io/modern-8-scaling.html

https://medium.com/@expectgreatdata/down-with-pipeline-debt-introducing-great-expectations-862ddc46782a

Two minutes hate: 
https://blog.ucsusa.org/michael-halpern/a-list-of-scientific-organizations-that-have-supported-and-opposed-limiting-what-research-epa-can-use-to-make-decisions

https://projects.propublica.org/asylum/

I used deep learning to cross a book of dinosaurs X a book of flowers

[https://twitter.com/chrisrodley/status/875266719660482560?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw]
http://www.mobihealthnews.com/content/trayts-new-app-help-people-neurodevelopmental-disorders-track-symptoms

https://www.datasciencecentral.com/profiles/blogs/what-does-gdpr-mean-for-your-business

Yes! Hooray for Machine Learning invading things!

A series of tubes, you say? 
https://www.quantamagazine.org/cells-talk-and-help-one-another-via-tiny-tube-networks-20180423/
